nodes.bodyText:
Do we have upcoming cleanup PR's to delete these files rather than commenting out, especially since we are heading out for GA?
cc: @JonathanGiles @srnagar @weidongxu-microsoft

The reason is that about 10 package get GAed, but the preview version of AzureResourceManager got about 20 packages.
Hence for a GA version of AzureResourceManager, the samples that using the non-GA package is commented out (e.g. ManageLinuxWebAppSqlConnection.java get commented out because sql package is non-GA, and it will not get published to Azure-Sample until sql package get GAed).
All of the commented-out sample would be put back when corresponding package get GAed (personally I hope it will be reverted sooner).
sample package will not be published to maven. It is for publish to repos on Azure-Sample.
What is the expected date for GA @weidongxu-microsoft ?

GA packages is published to maven yesterday.
https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.azure.resourcemanager
